meanings.sent1: Many people enjoy reading about celebs in magazines.
meanings.sent2: The red carpet was filled with celebs at the award show.
meanings.sent3: The party was so fancy, even the celebs felt underdressed.
meanings.sent4: In the world of entertainment, celebs shine like bright stars.
meanings.sent5: Paparazzi always follow the celebs, hoping for a good photo.

meanings.definition: Celebs: Plural form of celeb, meaning a famous person.
meanings.sent1: My sister got an autograph from two celebs at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The event was attended by various celebs from the music industry.
meanings.sent3: Even the local bakery has its own celebs who are famous for their pastries.
meanings.sent4: In the city, celebs are like landmarks that everyone recognizes.
meanings.sent5: The charity event was a success with the support of generous celebs.
